title: Lida93
author: Lida93
content: One matter I understand about plenti person for dis naija be say Dem too carry everytin d put under prayer only, imagine mata wey need person to put in action too rada de person go just the pray pray, dey do fasting up and down. But but tins go just de still go bad despite him casting nd bandin bcos him d use d place of work/act all insid prayer. Just lik d situation for we country naw, if you luk well you go see say only prayer without actin join no fit mk any good difference for tins for de country. As per dis election period wey be time to use change political leaders for office wey go dey in charge of our country mattas for de next four year, you go dey hear people dey day Dem d pray to God mk naija beta but dis same people wey dey pray no get PVC wey be part of wetin Dem go use mk God pass through to use answer their prayers to mk naija beta. This life it get part wey God go play and it get part wey we human being go need okay too to mk tins happen as we pray. Abi Dem tink say God go com down Himself com change tins!So I wan ask us, for those wey no get PVC and for those wey don register but never go collect their PVC, na wetin be ur excuse wey mk you never get ur PVC till now? Source https://www.facebook.com/100002600143360/posts/pfbid02MXG2xKdJjjEyz39Zqw7BAgHY3wZEUzgrcqwoidvb5hcNhZ5yEDdwinAE4Z6g2Rx2l/?app=fbl

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Na correct question you ask so and I no think say anybody fit bring better reasons why he or she no go get pvc, as Nigeria stands now na pvc fit help us fight to change things the way we want, but I think the reason why some people no get pvc be say them they fear say even if they go get pvc and they later come vote another person, na waiting the former one's do this new elected one's will also do too, as one yam Don spoil the rest we no know who will come and do better things for us, so my fellow comrades my advice for here be say make we try make our people understand make we choose better person and make Niger change.

If Dem give am den u fit do waybill mk Dem send d PVC to wer u dey stay now. Just try am see.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: No offence but the only set of person is I know now that would not have gotten their PVC is the members of Jehovah's witness. The reason being that it is their belief that they should be neutral in politics. Jehovahâ€™s Witnesses remain politically neutral for religious reasons, based on what the Bible teaches. We do not lobby, vote for political parties or candidates, run for government office, or participate in any action to change governments. We believe that the Bible gives solid reasons for following this course.Read more

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: There is no crime in praying for a better Nigeria but the issue is that those praying for a better Nigeria so not even have the PVC as you have said. Most of them that have permanent voters card would not even step out an inch from their houses on election day with the fear of electoral violence. This is a very funny situation just like you praying for a job and you saw an advert or you are being called for an interview and you fail to go for it what will you say about that situation? That is the current state of Nigeria and Nigerians. I pray for God to open our eyes to see, ears to hear and the knowledge to know what to do when the time comes.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: The matter with religion and Nigeria and real five and six matter and I dey really feel bad say these preachers most times no dey even preach the right things to their congregations forgetting that they're also citizens of the country and whatever way the country is been affected, so it will be with the preacher and it's members.I go also advice all this INEC officials to try as much as possible for sensitization of some very rural environments rather than letting them getting deceived by religion and not participating in the forth coming election.I personally never collect my voters card because I no been dey my ward and before I go reach the place(my ward) them say the portal son close and I regret that incidence.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: If you check the statistics of voters registration wey don happen for Nigeria, you go see sae na this coming election get the highest number of register member wey wan vote for this year election. Forget, many people don get their PVC and they get wait to use it to chase out bad government from the country. As the coming election dey so, we supposed to the hand am over to God in prayers. Peso no know how the election go be so. You vote and pray. So that God's will, will be done for the country. Don't stay put because sae you get PVC without handling the country security over to God.

comments.body: so as much as prayer is important we actually need to start taking responsibility this is something that will be of help to everyone so taking this election seriously matters a lot, if you sincerely look at what is currently going on, Nigerians know the truth but just because of what they will get from this politicians not knowing that what politicians know how to do best is to take advantage of people that is what they are good at so let us try and get our PVC and also vote right and stay safe.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: uche6215 on February 06, 2023, 09:37:23 PMOmor the truth out the matter be say I no get PVC at allllllll.Because this country matter done tire me ooo make I no lie.But I go use my hard ain money ðŸ’° support PETER OBI for this election. Even if LABOUR PARTY no share money I go use my own money share give pipo way vote PETER OBI for the poli unit way dey close to me. Because of PETER OBI nah good man. Which support do you fit give when you do get PVC and you are not feeling remorse about that, why do we dey deceive ourselves like this, you believe say your money or social media political analyses fit influence anyone into voting for your candidate when you yourself can not deliver your own vote. -One of the major set back Peter OBI will have in this election is the fact that he has a large amount of social media supporters,Â  who are not voters, so the only thing there can deliver for him is just social media hype and popularity without real votes. -This same thing affected Goddluck Jonathan in the 2015 general election. -Recently I was having a political discussion with one senior man like that, and this bros na stung Peter obi supporter like yourself, analyzed how Peter obi will transform the economy of the country and settle all our economic problems I was amazed by his level of confidence and in-depth understanding of Peter obi manifesto. -But the funniest thing I discovered toward the end of our discussion was that he is not an eligible voter, simply because he has done a voter's transfer to his village from Abuja, and he refused to go pick up his voter's card until the time for collections expired.-At that moment I discovered I wasted my time discussing with an enlightened Nigerian who is not responsible for performing his civic duty as a citizen. -A Nigerian without PVC at this moment is not permitted to discuss anything as it relates to 2023 or the choice of a candidate to vote for, charity their say begins at home.
